Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan's match is a must-win to stay in contention for the next stage of the T20 World Cup.
The match is crucial for Pakistan's World Cup journey after two losses.
Canada is looking to cause an upset against a struggling Pakistan side.
The pitch in New York has been improving but remains unpredictable.
Cloudy and humid weather is expected, which could affect the game play.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan and Canada have only faced each other once in T20 history, with Pakistan winning by 35 runs.
Both teams have not performed well recently, with Pakistan losing two matches and Canada winning one.
Pakistan's assistant coach mentioned issues with shot selection and decision-making during their previous loss.
